item_price.description: Price at which this product will be added to the deal

quantity.description: Quantity â€“ e.g. how many items of this product will be added to the deal

discount_percentage.description: Discount %. If omitted, will be set to 0

duration.description: Duration of the product (when product durations are not enabled for the company or if omitted, defaults to 1)

product_variation_id.description: ID of the product variation to use. When omitted, no variation will be used.

comments.description: Any textual comment associated with this product-deal attachment. Visible and editable in the application UI.

enabled_flag.description: Whether the product is enabled on the deal or not. This makes it possible to add products to a deal with specific price and discount criteria - but keep them disabled, which refrains them from being included in deal price calculation. When omitted, the product will be marked as enabled by default.

product_id.description: ID of the product that will be attached
